responses.rules: There is only one rule. I RULE! OK 2 rules: the lame button does exist, but don't ever touch it.You've been warned...
responses.welcome: Welcome to the room XXX! Type /help to learn how to control me!
responses.welcomepm: Welcome to the room. Please read the rules. Or, don't and get thrown out.
responses.masterdjmode: The Master has taken the stage! Bow before XXX!
responses.djmode: XXX has taken the stage to amuse my master.
responses.qon: Alright ladies and gents. Get in line, watch your step, no shirts or pants allowed.
responses.qoff: FREE FOR ALL! THIS IS MADNESS! THIS IS SPARTA!
responses.onesong: One song then GTFO the decks....
responses.twosongs: Two songs then GTFO the decks....
responses.threesongs: Three song then GTFO the decks....
responses.onstagealready: Didn't notice you're on stage already?
responses.notinroom: You can't join the queue if you're not in the room!
responses.alreadyinq: You're already in the queue. Stop being greedy.....
responses.blacklisted: You were blacklisted. Please don't come back.
responses.autodjup: Forget the whales! SAVE THE BEATS!
responses.autodjdown: Looks like the rooms a rockin, I'll step down.
responses.notyourturn: Not your turn @XXXX type q to see the order, or q+ to add yourself.
responses.djsteppeddown: Everyone give it up for XXXX!
responses.vip: Everyone step aside, let XXXX through.
responses.notheme: No theme right now - play whatever you'd like.
